title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 32.1 - Background
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 32.1 - Background

State Regulations

This Part in conjunction with Part 34 of this Title will
promote the health, public safety and welfare of the driving public and help
ensure that all motor vehicles that are registered in New York State have the
required motor vehicle liability insurance. Adherence to the requirements of
this Part by licensed agents, brokers, agencies, insurance companies and the

New York State Automobile Insurance Plan (NYAIP) will facilitate the
compatibility of policyholder and vehicle information maintained by insurance
companies and the Department's registration file and insurance database records
thus enabling: (a) the creation of an
accurate and up-to-date insurance information database for all New York State
registered vehicles in accordance with the requirements of the Department's

Insurance Information & Enforcement System (IIES); (b) identification of uninsured motor
vehicles; (c) application of the
department's administrative sanctions; (d) use of the database information as a new
tool for on-the-road law enforcement; and
(e) the virtual elimination of ID card
fraud. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
32.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
